summary: This document is an email chain between two individuals, likely within the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS). The forwarded message reports that Jeffrey Epstein committed suicide on the morning of August 10, 2019, and died en route to the hospital.

persons.name: Berman, Geoffrey
persons.context: Recipient of the initial email reporting Epstein's suicide; appears to be a senior official in the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS).

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the email; reported to have committed suicide on the morning of August 10, 2019, and died while being transported to the hospital.

connections.description: Berman, as US Attorney for the Southern District of New York, was the lead federal prosecutor overseeing the criminal case against Epstein at the time of his death.

events.title: Epstein's Reported Suicide
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein reportedly committed suicide on the morning of August 10, 2019, and died while being transported to a hospital.

keyFacts: The email reports that Jeffrey Epstein committed suicide on the morning of August 10, 2019.
Epstein died while en route to the hospital following the suicide.
The communication is between individuals within the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS), indicating official notification of the event.
